PrivacyPolicies.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicies.welcomeMessage: Welcome to Shiny Waffle Funiro Elevate Home Spaces! Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our app and services. By using Shiny Waffle Funiro Elevate Home Spaces, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy.
PrivacyPolicies.personalInformation: Personal Information: When you sign up or place an order, we may collect your name, email address, phone number, shipping address
PrivacyPolicies.usageData: Usage Data: We collect information about your interactions with our app, such as pages viewed, items clicked, and the time spent on each page.
PrivacyPolicies.deviceInformation: Device Information: We collect information about your device, including your IP address, browser type, operating system, and unique device identifiers.
PrivacyPolicies.cookies: Cookies and Tracking Technologies: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience and track the performance of our app.
PrivacyPolicies.provideAndImprove: To Provide and Improve Our Services: We use your information to process orders, manage your account, and enhance our app's functionality and user experience.
PrivacyPolicies.communicate: To Communicate with You: We use your contact information to send you updates, promotions, and notifications related to your activity on Shiny Waffle Funiro Elevate Home Spaces.
PrivacyPolicies.personalize: To Personalize Your Experience: We use your data to recommend products that match your preferences and interests.
PrivacyPolicies.security: To Ensure Security: We use your information to prevent fraud, detect security breaches, and protect the integrity of our app.
PrivacyPolicies.shareInfoParagraph: We do not sell your personal information to third parties. We may share your information with:
PrivacyPolicies.serviceProviders: Service Providers: We may share your information with trusted third-party service providers who assist us in operating our app, processing payments, or delivering products.
PrivacyPolicies.legalObligations: Legal Obligations: We may disclose your information if required by law or if we believe it is necessary to protect our rights, comply with a judicial proceeding, court order, or legal process.
PrivacyPolicies.businessTransfers: Business Transfers: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of all or part of our business, your information may be transferred as part of that business transaction.
PrivacyPolicies.dataSecurityParagraph: We take the security of your information seriously. We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, loss, or misuse. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, so we cannot guarantee absolute security.
PrivacyPolicies.accessAndUpdate: Access and Update Your Information: You can access and update your personal information through your account settings.
PrivacyPolicies.optOut: Opt-Out of Communications: You can opt out of receiving promotional emails by following the unsubscribe link in the emails.
PrivacyPolicies.requestDeletion: Request Deletion: You can request the deletion of your personal information by contacting us directly.
PrivacyPolicies.thirdPartyLinksParagraph: Our app may contain links to third-party websites or services. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these third parties. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of any third-party sites you visit.
PrivacyPolicies.childrensPrivacyParagraph: Shiny Waffle Funiro Elevate Home Spaces is not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If we become aware that a child under 13 has provided us with personal information, we will take steps to delete such information.
PrivacyPolicies.changesPolicyParagraph: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated effective date. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.
PrivacyPolicies.contactUsParagraph: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at:
PrivacyPolicies.thankYou: Thank you for choosing Shiny Waffle Funiro Elevate Home Spaces! We appreciate your trust in us and are committed to protecting your privacy.

PaymentOptions.title: Payment Options
PaymentOptions.description: Choose your preferred payment method to complete your purchase on Elevate Home Spaces.
PaymentOptions.onlyCardAvailable: Currently, only card payments are available.
PaymentOptions.step1: Select 'Pay with Card' as your payment method.
PaymentOptions.step2: Enter your card details, including card number, expiration date, and CVV.
PaymentOptions.step3: Confirm your payment details and click 'Submit'.
PaymentOptions.step4: Once the payment is successful, you will receive a confirmation email with your order details.
PaymentOptions.securityDescription: We use secure and encrypted payment gateways to protect your financial information. Your card details are not stored on our servers.
PaymentOptions.contactDescription: If you have any issues with payment, please contact our support team.
PaymentOptions.thankYou: Thank you for choosing Elevate Home Spaces!
